column1: Smoque BBQ////Brisket and pulled pork are good
column2: but the ribs are heavenly. They use 11 spices in their rub to form the most amazing outer crust. Side bbq sauce is on point with champion bbq. If you like chili
column3: the brisket chili will not dissapoint. Prices are pretty darn good (sandwiches $7
column4: includes delicious slaw). A full slab of ribs is $17 (you'd pay $20 at famous daves). It does get crowded
column6: but they have a very efficient system (one cashier
column8: and they line the orders up on the counter). Even though seating can feel a little cramped
column9: it's not bad considering the size of the building.
